prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that has a mischievous grin and glows in the dark.
Imagine a spooky Pokemon that can blend into shadows and has a playful personality.
Generate a Pokemon with haunting eyes and a spooky aura, perfect for Halloween.
Design a ghostly creature that floats above the ground and has a distinct purple hue.
Give me a Pokemon that loves to scare others but has a soft spot for friends.
Show me a dual-type Pokemon that combines ghostly energy with a mischievous spirit.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and loves to play tricks.
